post.summary: Estimate export date for a new order

requestBody.description: Order object that needs to be estimated
Shipment Address object that needs to be added
Shipment Address object that needs to be updated

coupon_client.description: Coupon is ordered by client, required if coupon = true

coupon_vendor.description: Vendor for fabric, required if coupon = true

type.description: Fabric type : Plain|Stripes|Check, required if coupon = true

coupon_deliverydate.description: Delivery date for fabric if coupon provided by client

shoulder_line.description: Jacket Shoulder slope  (id=VShSlope; lbl=SHOULDER LINE; param=VShSlope)

sleeve_head.description: Jacket Sleeve Head name  (id=VcapManeca; lbl=SLEEVE HEAD; param=capmaneca)

main_lining.description: main lining (id=VdoublA; lbl=MAIN LINING - A; param=doublure_a)

buttons.description: Jacket Buttons type name  (id=Vnasturi; lbl=BUTTONS; param=boutons)

collar_felt.description: Jacket Collar Felt type name  (id=Vguler; lbl=COLLAR FELT; param=feutre)

lapel_buttonhole.description: lapel buttonhole (id=VnasturiReversel; lbl= CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / LAPEL BUTTONHOLE; param=boutonniere_revers)

cma1.description: Sleeves Contrast Buttonhole 1 (id=cma1; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Sleeves; param=cma1)

cma2.description: Sleeves Contrast Buttonhole 2 (id=cma2; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Sleeves; param=cma2)

cma3.description: Sleeves Contrast Buttonhole 3 (id=cma3; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Sleeves; param=cma3)

cma4.description: Sleeves Contrast Buttonhole 4 (id=cma4; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Sleeves; param=cma4)

cma5.description: Sleeves Contrast Buttonhole 5 (id=cma5; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Sleeves; param=cma5)

cma6.description: Sleeves Contrast Buttonhole 6 (id=cma6; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Sleeves; param=cma6)

cdv1.description: Front Contrast Buttonhole 1 (id=cdv1; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Front; param=cdv1)

cdv2.description: Front Contrast Buttonhole 2 (id=cdv2; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Front; param=cdv2)

cdv3.description: Front Contrast Buttonhole 3 (id=cdv3; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Front; param=cdv3)

cdv4.description: Front Contrast Buttonhole 4 (id=cdv4; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Front; param=cdv4)

cdv5.description: Front Contrast Buttonhole 5 (id=cdv5; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Front; param=cdv5)

cdv6.description: Front Contrast Buttonhole 6 (id=cdv6; lbl=CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / CONTRAST BUTTONHOLES / Front; param=cdv6)

secondary_options.description: List of secondary options (id=Voptions; lbl=; param=v_options)

elbow_patch.description: Jacket Collar Felt type name (id=Vcoud; lbl=ALCANTRA COLOR; param=coudieres)

detachable_inlay_color.description: detachable inlay color (id=Vpippingsel; lbl=DETACHABLE INLAY COLOR; param=Vinlay)

collar_contrast_color.description: collar contrast color (id=Vcollarcontrsel; lbl=COLLAR CONTRAST COLOR; param=Vcollar)

piping_color.description: piping color (id=Vpippingsel; lbl=COLLAR CONTRAST COLOR; param=Vpipping)

bow_tie_fabric.description: Bow tie frabic reference  (id=PpcodTesatura; lbl=BOWTIE FABRIC REF; param=tissu_papion)

handkerchief_fabric.description: Handkerchief frabic reference  (id=BcodTesatura; lbl=HANDKERCHIEF FABRIC; param=tissu_pochette)

name.description: Unique identifier representing a jacket base.
Unique identifier representing a jacket construction.
Unique identifier representing a jacket sleeve head.

id.description: Unique identifier representing a jacket interior.
Unique identifier representing a jacket lining.
Unique identifier representing a jacket pocket.
Unique identifier representing a jacket vent.

name.description: Unique identifier representing a jacket button.

id.description: Unique identifier representing a jacket lapel buttonhole.

name.description: Unique identifier representing a jacket collar felt.
Unique identifier representing a jacket elbow patch.
Unique identifier representing a jacket contrast thread.

total_length.description: Jacket Total Length (id=VlungimeSpate; lbl=TOTAL LENGTH; param=longueur_dos)

left_sleeve_length.description: Jacket Left Sleeve Length (id=VlungimeManecaStanga; lbl=LEFT SLEEVE; param=manche_gauche)

right_sleeve_length.description: Jacket Right Sleeve Length (id=VlungimeManecaDreapta; lbl=RIGHT SLEEVE; param=manche_droite)

left_shoulder_slope.description: left shoulder slope (id=VcodUmarStang; lbl=LEFT SHOULDER / LOW si / HIGH; param=code_epaule_gauche)

right_shoulder_slope.description: left shoulder slope (id=VcodUmarDrept; lbl=RIGHT SHOULDER / LOW si / HIGH; param=code_epaule_droite)

first_button.description: first button possition (id=V1ErBouton; lbl=FIRST BUTTON POSITION; param=v_1er_bouton)

items.description: List of secondary Alterations (id=Voptions; lbl=; param=v_alterations)

construction_and_making.description: constructin and making (id=Pconstructie; lbl=CONSTRUCTION & MAKING; param=Pconstruction)

front_pockets.description: Trouser front pockets  (id=PbuzunareFata; lbl=FRONT POCKETS; param=poches_devant)

back_pockets.description: Trouser back pockets  (id=PbuzunareSpate; lbl=BACK POCKETS; param=poches_dos)

closure_type.description: closure type  (id=Pclosure; lbl=CLOSURE TYPE; param=Pclosure si p_options)

buttons.description: Trouser Buttons type name  (id=Pnasturi; lbl=BUTTONS; param=boutons_pant)

items.description: List of secondary options  (id=Poptions; lbl=SECONDARY OPTIONS; param=p_options)

id.description: Unique identifier representing a trouser front pocket.
Unique identifier representing a trouser back pocket.
Unique identifier representing a trouser front crease.
Unique identifier representing a trouser lining.
Unique identifier representing a trouser bottom finish.

name.description: Unique identifier representing a trouser button.

finished_outseam_left.description: Trouser Finished Outseam - use instead of inseam if preferable

finished_outseam_right.description: Trouser Finished Outseam - use instead of inseam if preferable

id.description: Unique identifier representing a Waistcoat pocket.
Unique identifier representing a Waistcoat button.

oldorderno.description: use this id to modify an existing order (Ex=W762096)

shipment_address.description: Shipment Address ( default empty, see GET /shipment_addresses )

name.description: Unique identifier representing a shirt base.

code.description: Unique identifier representing a Shipment Address.

customer_no.description: NAV Customer No to which Shipment Address is allocated (readonly).
